name: Aquarium Pairs
description:
Aquarium Pairs is a gorgeous and fun matching pairs memory game, perfect for kids and a great time killer!

Features:
- Easy and Fun game to play.
- Beautiful Graphics.
- Pleasant Music and Sound effects.
- Up to 6 Different board sizes.
- Play single player, 2 players, or single player vs CPU.
- Close the game any time and resume later.
- Fullscreen support.

More games and info at www.boviosoft.com
